author: hqucms
body:
#### PR description:

Backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/42670

> This pull request fixes a few typos in the jetsAK4 CHS and Puppi tables:
> 
> (1) Fix to the `btagRobustParTAK4CvB` definition: the previous definition was using the `pfDeepFlavourJetTags` instead of pfParticleTransformerAK4JetTags` for the `probbb` and `problepb` scores in the denominator. This affects both the CHS and Puppi AK4 jet tables, and **probably(?) affects the official production.**
> 
> (2) Fix to the `nanoAOD_addDeepInfoAK4()` fucntion in the `jetsAK4_Puppi_cff.py`: *this should only affects private/custom productions.*
> 

#### PR validation:

title: [13_0_X] Fix typos in jetsAK4 CHS and Puppi tables
